name: OVERFOWL
description:
CONTROLS:

  • MOUSE AIM
  • LEFT MOUSE CLICK
  • MOUSE CLICK IN MID-AIR TO GHOST (pass through enemies and some walls)

GOAL:
KILL THE FROGS

UPGRADES:
IF YOU UPGRADE TO MUCH THEY WILL RESTART TO 0, OR EVEN A NEGATIVE NUMBER(an overflow happens). CAREFUL!

SLICK OST BY Alek Fleischer
